error.jsonParse: Incapaz de analizar el archivo JSON.
error.monaInvalid: Formato de archivo Mona-Uranai no válido
error.goInvalid: Formato de archivo de copia de seguridad de LB no válido.

tooltip.detectdup: Find upgrade/duplicates in the LB inventory and merge the import into LB.
tooltip.ignoreDup: Do not detect upgrades/duplicates, the import is added on top of existing LB inventory.
tooltip.delNotInImport: Assume the import to be the full inventory. Items in LB Inventory that doesn't exist in the import are deleted.
tooltip.keepNotInImport: Assume the import is a partial inventory. Nothing will be deleted.

sillyCard.desc: We <1>stole borrowed (with permission) all the character assets from Silly Wisher and gene splice it into Genshin Optimizer.
